name: Nugget Run 1.5
description: This is nugget run, or as I like to call it, "The Dark Souls of nugget based flying games with top down shooter elements." Don't forget about the  kickin' 15 second loop of a soundtrack made by yours truly. Have a very painful time. Also there's a random hidden room in the game that I threw together without any thought or reason so don't expect much on that front.
